name: BlockSurvey
description: BlockSurvey is a privacy-focused, AI-powered platform for creating secure surveys and forms with end-to-end encryption.
longDescription: BlockSurvey is a privacy-centric platform designed to enable users to create and distribute surveys and forms while ensuring data security through end-to-end encryption and blockchain technology. Its mission is to provide a safe, anonymous, and user-controlled environment for data collection, prioritizing respondent privacy. The platform leverages AI to streamline survey creation, offering features like automated question generation and real-time data analysis. It serves businesses, researchers, and organizations, particularly in sensitive areas like health and activism, by ensuring data ownership and eliminating third-party trackers. BlockSurvey supports Web3 companies with token-gated surveys and seamless integrations, making it a versatile tool for secure data collection. Its intuitive interface and robust privacy features make it ideal for users seeking trustworthy insights without compromising confidentiality.
features: End-to-end encryption ensures that only the survey creator and respondents can access the data, providing maximum privacy.
AI-powered survey creation generates tailored, high-quality questions in seconds based on user prompts, simplifying the design process.
Zero Knowledge Surveys guarantee that no one except the survey creator can access respondents’ data, enhancing trust and engagement.
Token gating allows Web3 companies to restrict surveys to specific blockchain token holders, enabling targeted data collection.
Real-time AI-driven analytics transform survey responses into actionable insights, saving time and improving decision-making.
Customizable templates and white-label options let users brand surveys to match their identity, enhancing professionalism.
Onion Routing support via Tor browser ensures complete respondent anonymity and protection from IP tracking.
Seamless integrations with tools like Google Sheets, HubSpot, and Zendesk streamline data workflows and analysis.
Adaptive AI questioning dynamically adjusts follow-up questions based on responses, fostering deeper insights.
Bot prevention tools protect surveys from malicious or automated submissions, ensuring data quality.
Multilingual survey support enables data collection from global audiences, breaking language barriers.
Conditional logic and branching create dynamic, personalized survey experiences for respondents.

faqs.question: What is BlockSurvey used for?
faqs.answer: BlockSurvey is used to create secure, anonymous surveys and forms with end-to-end encryption, ideal for collecting sensitive data in areas like health, research, and Web3 applications.

faqs.question: Does BlockSurvey offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, BlockSurvey provides a free plan with limited features, allowing users to create and distribute surveys without a subscription.

faqs.question: How does BlockSurvey ensure data privacy?
faqs.answer: BlockSurvey uses end-to-end encryption and a Zero Knowledge framework, ensuring only the survey creator can access responses, with no third-party trackers or data sharing.

faqs.question: Can I create anonymous surveys with BlockSurvey?
faqs.answer: Yes, BlockSurvey supports fully anonymous surveys, allowing respondents to provide honest feedback without revealing their identity unless they choose to.

faqs.question: Does BlockSurvey support Web3 features?
faqs.answer: Yes, BlockSurvey offers token-gated surveys across 10+ blockchain networks, enabling Web3 companies to engage specific communities securely.

faqs.question: How does the AI feature help in survey creation?
faqs.answer: BlockSurvey’s AI generates tailored questions, optimizes wording, and provides real-time analytics, making survey creation faster and more insightful.

faqs.question: Can BlockSurvey integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, BlockSurvey integrates with tools like Google Sheets, Airtable, HubSpot, and Zendesk for streamlined data management and workflows.

faqs.question: Is BlockSurvey suitable for academic research?
faqs.answer: Yes, its privacy features and anonymous survey options make it ideal for academic research, especially for sensitive topics requiring confidentiality.

faqs.question: Does BlockSurvey comply with privacy regulations?
faqs.answer: BlockSurvey complies with GDPR, HIPAA, and global privacy standards, ensuring secure and compliant data collection.
